2015 di shri lankawe sama anugrahakathwayen sammatha karaganna lada eksath jathinge manawa himikam mandalaye 30/1 yojanawa prakara sathyaya sewima saha yuda samaye siduwim yalith sidu nowima pinisa wasara awasanaya wanawita kriyathmaka kala yuthuwa thibunu karunu methek itu kara nomathi bawa penwa dena warthawa, wisheshayenma widhayaka janadhipathi kramaya saha budu dahamata himi sthanaya sambandha mathabheda hamuwe nawa wyawasthawa sampadanaya kirime kriyawaliya da atharamaga anahita thibena bawath penwa deyi.

eya ese wanne siya pawathmata awashya karana sampath uddharanayata : owunta nishchitha awakashayak wuwamana karana nisaya.

habayi je. aar. eeta 'baldiyak' peraluwe giwisuma gini thaba nuwarata pa gamanak arambaaminya. 1964 di sabhaga aanduwak sadu sirimawo sirima - shasthri giwisuma gasu athara eekatath ejapaya erehi wiya. 1964 di sabhaga aanduwak sadu dadli - chelwanayagam ekka giwisumak gasu athara eyata wiruddhawa shri lan.ni.pa. - ko.pa. - sama samaja hawula karali gasuha. 71 di sirimawoge hawul aanduwata ja. wi. pe. sannaddha praharayak ella wenakota je. aar. kiwe etherin ho hamudawa genath karalla ma¾dinna kiyaya.
